name: RocketBoots Mania
detailed_description:
JOIN THE ROCKET BOOTS MANIA !


PUT ON THE ROCKET BOOTS and experience the freedom of movement in the one of a kind fast paced competitive community-driven parkour platformer.

BECOME A REBEL, explore the dynamic 3D physics based environment, find & create your path to get the best score.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF, your friends, or the whole world over the highscore on some of the most challenging arenas you have ever seen.

Key Features

  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Highly replayable
  • Official leaderboards
  • Awesome community

Game State Now

  • 99.9% stable, bug-free experience
  • 30+ final quality fully enjoyable levels in our unique physics-based world and 1 BOSS fight
  • Regular events and challenges coming usually twice a month

Will Be Added During Early Access

  • Level Editor + Steam Workshop
  • Online race mode - multiple players competing in an arena at the same time + rewards
  • Player profile with stats, country, XP points, badges and rewards
  • Player friend lists
  • Achievements
  • Speedrun mode

TAGS

#RocketBootsMania
Rocket Boots Mania

short_description: One of a kind fast paced competitive community-driven parkour platformer with heavy emphasis on player freedom, choice and online competition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
